jv.geom

Class PgEdgeStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.vecmath.P_Vector
      • jv.vecmath.PiVector
        • jv.geom.PgEdgeStar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class PgEdgeStar
extends PiVector
    Edge of an element set with indices to both endpoints, adjacent elements, and local index of vertex in each element, whose neighbour refers to an element at this edge.

    There may be more than two elements joining an edge.

    Note, when superclass has changed to PiVector then method this#getSize() has been renamed to this#getValence() to avoid conflict PiVector#getSize().

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
